alert.note: Alert for Laurens; Spartanburg; Union (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 20 at 5:36PM EDT until June 20 at 6:15PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: The National Weather Service in Greenville-Spartanburg has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Laurens County in Upstate South Carolina... Southeastern Spartanburg County in Upstate South Carolina... West central Union County in Upstate South Carolina... * Until 615 PM EDT. * At 536 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 6 miles north of Laurens, or 5 miles east of Gray Court, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Laurens, Cross Keys, Cross Anchor, Enoree, Ora, Gray Court and Woodruff. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report damaging winds, hail, or flooding to the National Weather Service by calling toll free, 1, 800, 2 6 7, 8 1 0 1, or by posting on our Facebook page, or Tweet it using hashtag nwsgsp. Your message should describe the event and the specific location where it occurred.
